Posts.Content: Hi not well long before B C was found but was told to stop dieting as I went from a size 22 to 10 in 8 mouths never went back after that put a bit of weight back on after chemo ,but now they think they need to check again as not well in other ways it might not be cancer but it is my worry ! I am going to be sedated but I don't mind that . thank you
Posts.Title: Feeling down

Posts.Content: Hi had the results all ok so did worry about nothing but at the time my head was swimming but thank you I hope you are doing ok as well . bye for now
Posts.Title: Feeling down

Posts.Content: Hi Sorry just feeling a bit low at the moment ,still trying to get over chemo and radiotherapy cannot get out of a slump you could call it as now got to have a colonoscopy on Tuesday as I think they are thinking I may have bowel cancer what a bummer if you don't mind the pone . I know I should not think the worst but as its not a year since breast cancer I though really .sorry having a whinge no one to talk to as don't want to tell kids as they are going to worry tell them when or IF! I have to plus brother is just out of hospital and don't want to worry him. bye for now
Posts.Title: Feeling down

Posts.Content: Hi Ange Glad you have made it through the first one sort of ok ,as you say now you know what's to come should be a bit easier .If your not feeling sick stop taking them your body has enough to contend with at the moment the less medication most be for the better. I was given senicot  to take for a few days did you not get these as well mind you so much medication it is a bit of an overload in your mind ,I cannot see why you cannot take the lactulose its got to be better than all the discomfort .Good luck with the rest of the chemo .
Posts.Title: lactulose ? domperidone?

Posts.Content: Hi 12 mouths after chemo  had my hair cut twice still looks like i put my finger in electric socket (he he) but it is thicker than it was and it was very thick as it was hair dresser finds it fun (in a nice way )as my hair was so straight ,but at least i have hair so that has got to be better  keep smiling
Posts.Title: Does anyone have curly chemo hair ?

Posts.Content: Hi Kimmy j I was worried as well but for no reason after the first injection I didn't feel anything ,just have to lay still so much better just have to have it checked and cleaned each week .I was given a sleeve to shower in as you cannot get it wet .Good luck for Wednesday ,good luck for all your treatment .
Posts.Title: Picc line.

Posts.Content: Hi I am so feed up with feeling ill and in pain operation was in Aug 14  had 3 lots fec so ill couldn't have more had 15 lots of radiotherapy now on herceptin and the side affects are hell, in so much pain some  times it takes me all my time to get up and make a cup of tea ! All i want to do is cry scream and all i do is say i am fine to keep family happy sorry i need to moan sorry just had my fill
Posts.Title: feed up

Posts.Content: They have there own family's with there own problems they dont need mine , i live on my own and it is  medication that got me in this hell hole so why would i want more ? All i know is they said things would get better i have given up with dr they treat you like sheep we are all the same when we are not you don't matter
Posts.Title: feed up

Posts.Content: Hi Yilshen Only seen a Different one once but he then came and took over as i was not happy with what was said so i only see him now . i hope you get a better one next time ,the thing is we have nowhere to go so we are stuck ,some peolpe talk about treatment and sounds so good great B C N and Dr them you get another hospital and like me you feel like a waste of NHS money not a person  good luck on your next appointment
Posts.Title: feed up

Posts.Content: Spoke to BCN in March when had a problem said she would call me still waiting . if I stop and it comes back they will say it is my fault  the medication has damage my stomach so have problems with food had to go on a fod  diet now told to try other food again  still not good ,so medication is out  I am in a no win situation
Posts.Title: feed up

Posts.Content: I am past shouting when i see the oncologist i just get upset and dont talk to him as when i say i am unwell all he says is what do you want me to do ?stop the treatment he will not talk to me he looks at the computer and types while i try and talk so i have given up . Some of it  must be my fault i know as i try and question him a lot ,so much so when he came to see me once it started with "it had to be you " so i have had it . i just want it over ,sorry but thank you for your reply it is good to talk to someone n the similar position  thank you
Posts.Title: feed up

Posts.Content: Hi just hoping for a break as feel so cr-- all the time hardly got the bathroom today really bad day ,be back in bed soon
Posts.Title: Herceptin break

Posts.Content: Hi  Have tried to talk but never see the same person tell what is going on all they say is oh ,give me the next one and next appointment not a lot of help even the Dr dismissed me ,not much help not sure if I will have many more ,don't have what I call a back up team
Posts.Title: Herceptin break

Posts.Content: Hi I am on Herceptin at the moment not coping very well ,would like to go away for a few days but don't want to feel like c--- while away as I take my disabled daughter with me .has any one else asked for a break and if so what was said by Dr or nurses ?
Posts.Title: Herceptin break

Posts.Content: Last time I saw the Dr told him I would of been better if had put me down instead of treating me I got no response so take it from me I do not go in softly,softly I have just had enough feeling ill all the time
Posts.Title: Herceptin break

Posts.Content: hi smith do them,amaozon, the works  and waterstones book shop.
Posts.Title: Adult colouring books

Posts.Content: Hi all thank you for messages only seen my breast cancer nurse twice in the last year so for me a waste of time ,told oncologist he just said oh I will wait until October and hope I can cope with the pain.
Posts.Title: Tender still after a year .

Posts.Content: Had my appointment through for my first yearly check up after my lumpectomy,but worried I know the last one was in July when they first found it the appointment is not until October but I am still very tender so not looking forward to it anyone else still tender even after a year later?
Posts.Title: Tender still after a year .

Posts.Content: Hi Tracey So sorry to hear about what is happening to you . I am not to good in pain with back legs and arms at times i only had 3 fec as ended up in hospital each time 15  radiotherapy . On herceptin now told that is the problem  could take 12 -18 months to go away after finished still have 8 to go . Some days i can walk round a shop some days making a cup of tea is a task on its own . Hope M R I will help and can stop the pain  good luck
Posts.Title: Left disabled after cancer treatment

Posts.Content: Hi Weeble had my bone scan yesterday now the waiting game again as they told me it will be 10 days to 2 weeks ,i was hoping it would be quicker but no! But i am trying now to be positive that they will find nothing but it is hard some days when i am tired ,
Posts.Title: Head working overtime

Posts.Content: Hi Went to breast Dr yesterday for my check up first one had operation August 14  have lots of pain all the time just put it down to side affects of HerceptIn ,now this Dr is worried it could be bone cancer so asked me to have a body imagine done i said yes started to worry last night not a lot of sleep then in the post today is appointment for Monday to fast for me ,now i am worried . life sucks sometimes
Posts.Title: Head working overtime

Posts.Content: Hi Didn't ask how long i would wait for results do you know anyone ? i hope its a false alarm as well
Posts.Title: Head working overtime

Posts.Content: Hi It was my local Caner centre, the BCN that spoke to me before my op in August about this and said only to use this, one but it was a no go ,I just don't want to talk to any medical staff
Posts.Title: Massage

Posts.Content: Hi Decided I would sort out to have a massage in caner Wessex centre ,as a bit stressed with treatment and have a pain in arm shoulder and back ,going away in a few weeks and want to be able to swim in hotel pool with my daughter ,but they wouldn't do it without me getting the ok from someone I am feed up with talking to medical staff I wanted to make a decision on my own what I wanted to do, anyone else had this problem ?  I was even more stressed by the time I got home
Posts.Title: Massage

Posts.Content: Hi Bunners I have had a lot of joint pain ,my tenth one of 18 so just over half way ,but told this is not common so hopefully you get no side affects  good luck
Posts.Title: Herceptin - any side effects to the sub cut method ?

Posts.Content: Hi I had op August 14, 3 lots chemo,15  lots rad as well, all finished march but I still am getting pain spoke to a couple of people but they didn't seem to be worried about it. but with everything if it worries you talk to some one A S A P for your peace of  mind . keep fighting
Posts.Title: terrible pain in breast.

Posts.Content: Hi Had my last chemo in November and my hair is growing back afro style of course but my head is so tender ,I don't know what to do to help with the pain anyone have any idea's .Never had a wig only had a beanie on outside so head has always been open no irritation wait to hear ? Bye For Now
Posts.Title: Score scalp

Posts.Content: Hi yes I do have a head of hair now all curls never had that before plus very grey my hair was dark and straight shoulder length so still wired when I look in the mirror, but I can cope with that it is the pain that is hard .
Posts.Title: Score scalp

Posts.Content: Hi Mrs D I was never told not to eat these items so I cannot think it will do to much harm as I am ok, but ask the chemo nurse for saftey .
Posts.Title: Food question.?
